trait_group_interesting2: Wizard's Ascendance (Elevate Primordial Energy to Transcendence)
trait_group_interesting3: Innate Affinity (Convert World Essence for Personal Energy)
trait_sorcery01_info: Dance with wind's breath, stride through canopy as autumn leaf adrift
status_desc_Ring01: Toes barely grazing earth, the body becomes willow catkin fluttering through branches
trait_sorcery02_info: Fingers cradle living flame, scorching core melts steel resolve
trait_sorcery03_info: Water spirits weave mist-bound labyrinth, disorienting prey
trait_sorcery04_info: Sacred brook's murmur knits flesh and spirit whole
trait_sorcery05_info: Tectonic plates shift to form living armor
trait_sorcery06_info: Ancient roots surge from soil, entombing limbs in arboreal prison
trait_sorcery07_info: Eyes pierce through illusions, locking onto the enemy's vital energy, leaving no room for error
status_desc_Ring06: Golden patterns emerge in the pupils, capturing every muscle twitch and breath rhythm of the enemy
trait_sorcery11_info: Exsanguinating touch saps vigor, fortifying caster through stolen vitality
trait_sorcery12_info: Living vines morph into constricting lattice of pain
trait_sorcery13_info: Tectonic might coalesces into volcanic carapace
trait_sorcery15_info: Become the tempest's eye, where zephyr and hurricane conjoin
status_desc_Ring14: An awakening communion with air Elementals – limbs feel weightless, movements acquire liquid grace
trait_sorcery16_info: Naiad-born fog clouds perception and memory
trait_sorcery17_info: Weaving force fields, clinging like a leech, impossible to evade
status_desc_Ring16: Invisible threads of force field surround the body, guiding all attacks toward the target
trait_sorcery22_info: Constellation patterns burn retinas, scrambling thought and identity
status_desc_Ring22: Am I... merging with the stars? Memories dissolving like stardust...
trait_sorcery23_info: Arcane tendrils pierce veins, draining crimson essence
trait_sorcery24_info: Earthshakers' chant reshapes bedrock into living fortress
trait_sorcery25_info: Primordial aquifer flows with liquid longevity
status_desc_Ring21: Every cell pulses with rejuvenating power
trait_sorcery26_info: Chronal threads unravel, accelerating biological collapse
trait_sorcery27_info: Engraving fate's trajectory, ensuring a destined hit, the cycle of cause and effect
status_desc_Ring26: A blood-red rune appears at the fingertip, marking the target so that no matter how they dodge, the strike is inevitable
trait_sorcery28_info: Starlight refracts, phase rifts, shadowy remnants
status_desc_Ring27: Shattering mirror reflections, making the stars complicit in deception
status_desc_Ring31: Atmospheric density multiplies exponentially – movement requires Herculean effort
trait_sorcery32_info: Summon the dragon's breath that birthed volcanoes
trait_sorcery33_info: Channel God-Strike that sundered ancient civilizations
trait_sorcery34_info: Blood-pact opens thousand-eyed void, devouring adversaries' lifeforce
status_desc_Ring34: Veins become eldritch sigils, reality fractures through countless hellgates
trait_sorcery35_info: Hadean blade resonates with entropy, unraveling spiritual existence
trait_flair81_info: Affinities become inert, meditation techniques disabled
trait_flair9_info: 100% hereditary. Innate gifts cease essence consumption
trait_flair92_info:
Your ordered 『True Spirit Preservation Service』 has been signed for by Chaotic Express! From now on:
Receive a 『Yasu Water』 bath experience voucher with each physical reimbursement
50% chance to gain practical talents such as Tentacle Affinity or Mushroom Propagation upon rebirth (ಡωಡ)
Note: The final interpretation rights of this package belong to the player
trait_flair93_info: Breaking the limits of life form, freeing the cultivator from the shackles of physical aging, binding the soul to the energy core permanently, allowing infinite continuation of cultivation until touching the source of rules
trait_flair94_info: You have attracted the attention of an angel, and it seems you have gained something?
trait_flair95_info: You have attracted the attention of God, and it seems you have gained something?
trait_Grade4_info: Yuan Neng Requirement: 77 (Unlocks spell damage bonus, spell damage tied to intelligence)
trait_Grade9_info: Rootless Origin Requirement: 380 (Unlocks ascent to Ancestor after reincarnation)
trait_Grade91_info:
Rootless Origin Requirement: 1000 (Consumes 700 Rootless Origin)
Upon death, wizards greatly increase Yuan Neng; Great Wizards greatly increase Rootless Origin
update_txt_3: A new version of this mod is available
